name: Pet Promise
description: Pet Promise is a platform simplifying pet care, adoption, and donation campaigns, making it easy to adopt, donate, or support pet welfare.

name: Meal Mates
description: MealMates is a web app that connects food donors with those in need, reducing food waste by donating surplus food before it expires.

name: Movie Sphere
description: MovieSphere - A platform to explore, manage, and enjoy movie gossips with an intuitive interface and powerful features.

name: InstantR
description: InstantR - A platform to explore, manage, and gain knowledge by the information and news which is happening world-wide with an intuitive interface and powerful features.
